label: Description
value: Horizontal rectangle, bevelled corners. A green brougham, surmounted by a coronet, the carriage drawn by two white horses and driven by a coachman in court livery -- blue livery and trappings -- standing under a blue and white awning with liveried guards by the door.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and blue, green, and rust watercolor, graphite on paper

label: Provenance
value: Sarah Cooper Hewitt, Erskine Hewitt, New York, NY; 1938: acquired by Museum

label: Description
value: White moiré ground with an applique of teacups, urns and various ornamental vessels cut from many kinds of silk fabrics and outlined with couched gold thread. Medium blue silk damask borders on sides and bottom, scalloped and finished with narrow gold ribbon.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metallic thread Technique: appliqué and embroidery on moire ground

label: Description
value: White solid looped uncut towel except at the ends, where on a border of plain weave is embroidered, in gold, a serpentine stem with five-pointed leaves and small flowers. Scalloped fringe on ends.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton, metallic thread Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft looping; embroidered

label: Description
value: White solid looped uncut pile except at ends, where on a border of plain weave, a secondary gold weft forms a symmetrical design of palmettes and flower-filled urns, with geometric and highly conventionalized foliate border. Scalloped fringe on ends.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton, metallic thread Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft looping and supplementary continuous weft

label: Description
value: Fantastical floral bouquet with flora features resembling leaves, blossoms, buds, and berries.

value: Etching a la poupée and teal, red-orange, purple, and orange ink on paper
Tricks of the Turf, or, Settling how to Lose a Race

label: Physical description
value: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor on paper

label: Description
value: Large, loose overblouse of patterned knitted lace. Trimmed at standing collar and cuffs of long sleeves with machine lace edging. Possibly a surplice.
Portrait of a Lady (Peg Woffington?) as a Shepherdess

label: Description
value: Patchwork quilt in design of oak leaves in green print surrounding ornament of a diamond within a circle of red printed cotton. Backed with white cotton. Lines of quilting follow the pattern.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: pieced and sewn patchwork of plain and roller-printed fabrics, quilted

label: Description
value: Brown twill background with closely spaced allover design of teacups in extra wefts of light and dark blue, tan, white, green silks and gold strips applied to paper. Inside portion of teacups in brown satin. Extra weft threads floated out loose on reverse with three selveges present.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk and metallic yarns Technique: compound satin woven

label: Description
value: Plain weave with light brown warps and wefts of doubled threads. Design consists of horizontal stripes in varying thicknesses in pale pink, shades of green, blue and red predominating. Some stripes have diamond-shapes in metallic threads.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: wool, metallic thread Technique: tapestry weave

label: Description
value: Cream silk plain cloth ground with polychrome silk embroidery in chain stitch. Ground powdered with flower springs. -a: has garland of flowers at either side. See n-t-624, but it does not appear to be chain stitch.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk on silk Technique: embroidered on plain weave

label: Notes
value: Cream silk plain cloth ground with polychrome silk embroidery in chain stitch. Ground powdered with flower springs. -a: has garland of flowers at either side. See n-t-624, but it does not appear to be chain stitch.

label: Description
value: Rectangular piece of cream-colored satin showing a continuous meandering vine and flower pattern embroidered along three sides of the panel. Inside are small, isolated flower sprigs.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk on silk Technique: chain stitch on satin foundation

label: Description
value: Design of horizontal stripes in varying thicknesses, the majority in red and others in dark blue, yellow and metallic thread. Hexagonal shapes have small rosettes and small geometric patterning. Fringes at ends.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: wool, metallic thread Technique: twill plain weave with compound twill stripes

label: Description
value: Panel of two widths of material having six selvedges present. White satin ground with multicolored cut and uncut "jardinier" velvet design of flower baskets, large-scale curving branches with leaves, blossoms and bunches of grapes.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk Technique: ciselé voided supplementary warp pile (velvet) in a satin foundation

label: Description
value: Horizontally-striped plain weave with a single warp of a light violet color and double thread weft with discontinuous weft patterning. The design consists of stripes of varying colors alternating with stripes with geometric designs. Fringes at ends.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: wool, metallic thread Technique: plain weave with continuous and discontinuous supplementary weft

label: Description
value: Panels with a coral ground and diaper pattern in extra white silk weft. Velvet design arranged in vertical broad bands of angular serpentine with large tulip blossoms and rosettes in coral and green, coral and yellow, coral and white, and coral and blue.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk Technique: cut voided supplementary warp pile (velvet) in a plain weave foundation with continuous supplementary weft

label: Description
value: Cream satin ground with large-scale design of several varieties of chrysanthemums and other smaller flowers brocaded in polychrome silks. Extra green weft forms the foliage. Both selvages present.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk Technique: plain compound satin with supplementary weft

value: Very sheer white ground with narrow vertical stripes of orange silk.

label: Dimensions
value: Warp x Weft (cut top & bottom; selvedge to selvedge): 161 x 66 cm (5 ft. 3 3/8 in. x 26 in.)

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Red velvet background with all-over repeat of single blossom framed by long pointed leaves with serrated edges. Center of blossom border on each side of dark blue satin with cone design in coral silk and gold. Edges piped and faced with printed cotton. Backed with red cotton twill. Velvet portion of panel composed of several pieces carefully sewed together.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metallic thread, cotton backing Technique: compound cut voided velvet cloth bordered with silk and metal compound satin and backed with cotton twill

label: Description
value: Square panel composed of two horizontal fragments sewed together near the center. Each panel has an incomplete design facing in opposite directions. Ground gold (faded in one fragment) has a design of a conventionalized cypress tree in green, red, blue and white. Border woven at the same time as the body in three bands of small-scale flowers. Piped and faced with blue and white striped compound satin. Backed with red cotton herringbone twill.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk, metallic threads; cotton backing Technique: plain compound weave

label: Description
